name: Portal Hotline Miami
description:
Portal Hotline Miami

Hi, I'm Anthony and this is my Prototype/Concept game which is a mashup of Portal and Hotline Miami. This isn't a full game, so not all of the features are implemented which I would have liked and there aren't very many maps. I've added a download link, aswell as a web player incase you use chrome or just prefer it in a standalone player :)

This is mainly to get people's feedback to see if they like it, or to give inspiration to another developer :)

The game was made in Unity and took just over a week, it was a good learning experience for me, so even if people don't enjoy it much, it was still worth it :D

Thanks for reading and I hope you enjoy the game. Please give me feedback on Twitter (or on this site if it's possible) :D

- Anthony
